item.title: INS Vikrant Delivered to Indian Navy: Indias First Indigenous Aircraft Carrier
item.description: In a historic milestone for India’s defense and shipbuilding industry, INS Vikrant, also known as Indigenous Aircraft Carrier 1 (IAC-1), has been delivered to the Indian Navy. This achievement marks India’s entry into the exclusive league of countries capable of designing and building aircraft carriers domestically. INS Vikrant is not just a warship; it is a symbol of technological ex
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
